def_en: A dresser is a chest of drawers, usually with a mirror on the top.

def_cn: (通常指用来存放瓷器的)碗橱,餐具柜
def_en: A dresser is a piece of furniture which has cupboards or drawers in the lower part and shelves in the top part. It is usually used for storing china.

def_cn: (剧院中协助演员穿戏服的)换装师,服装师
def_en: A dresser is someone who works in a theatre and helps the actors and actresses to dress.
You can use dresser to refer to the kind of clothes that a person wears. For example, if you say that someone is a smart dresser, you mean that they wear smart clothes.
